info.title: ByteReview API
info.description: AI-powered document data extraction service with asynchronous job processing

get.description: Get current user information - returns existing user or creates minimal profile

post.description:
Sync user profile with data from frontend
Frontend sends complete user profile data
Step 1: Initiate a new extraction job and get pre-signed upload URLs
Step 2: Start job processing with field configuration and task definitions

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific job
List jobs for the current user with pagination and filtering
Get job progress information for real-time updates

post.description:
Add more files to an existing job
Immediately extracts ZIP files via ARQ workers

get.description: Get flat list of files in a job

delete.description: Remove a file from a job (synchronous deletion for now)

get.description: Server-Sent Events stream for real-time job updates

post.description: Create a Stripe customer portal session
Upload files temporarily to server storage
Extract data from previously uploaded files
Extract structured data from PDF files using AI
Export extraction results to CSV format
Export extraction results to Excel format
Manually trigger cleanup of old temporary files (admin endpoint - GCS lifecycle policies handle automatic cleanup)

delete.description: Delete a specific uploaded file from storage and cache
Delete multiple uploaded files from storage and cache

price_id.title: Price Id
price_id.description: Stripe price ID for the subscription

success_url.title: Success Url
success_url.description: URL to redirect to on successful payment

cancel_url.title: Cancel Url
cancel_url.description: URL to redirect to on cancelled payment

return_url.title: Return Url
return_url.description: URL to return to from the portal

CreatePortalSessionRequest.title: CreatePortalSessionRequest
CreatePortalSessionRequest.description: Request to create a Stripe customer portal session

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the field to extract

data_type.title: Data Type
data_type.description: Expected data type (Text, Number, Date, etc.)

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Instruction for AI on what to extract

FileUploadInfo.title: FileUploadInfo
FileUploadInfo.description: Information about a file to be uploaded

JobFieldConfig.description: Field configuration for a job (snapshot from template)

JobInitiateRequest.description: Request to initiate a new job

JobListItem.description: Job list item for job listing

TaskDefinition.title: TaskDefinition
